channel.title: I need help with objects :) i need to remove something
channel.description:
hey i need some help with objects. as you can se it comes up a text at each object or button i click . how to remove that text so i dont see it? and same with actionbuttons?
[IMG]http://i621.photobucket.com/albums/tt292/kneistol/0020-1.png[/img]

item.title: I need help with objects :) i need to remove something
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

hey i found something like this and im dumb and im new to coding :I

heres what i found

case 252: // atObject2 objectID = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndianA(); // 5292 // bankwindow objectY = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian(); objectX = inStream.readUnsignedWordA(); if (playerRights > 2) { sM("atObject2: " + objectX + "," + objectY + " objectID: " + objectID); } if (debug || (playerRights > 1)) println_debug("atObject2: " + objectX + "," + objectY + " objectID: " + objectID); if (!antiHax()) break; if (misc.random(100) == 1) { triggerRandom(); break; } long now = System.currentTimeMillis(); boolean oFound = false; TurnPlayerTo(objectX, objectY); if ((objectID == 2646) && ((absX >= 2735) && (absX <= 2752)) && ((absY >= 3435) && (absY <= 3453))) { if (now - lastAction >= 900) { addItem(1779, 1); lastAction = now; } }

Read full topic

item.title: I need help with objects :) i need to remove something
item.dc:creator: @zerogordo zerogordo
item.description:
@zerogordo wrote:

[quote=“Adam, post:8, topic:315181”][quote author=freakinlost link=topic=411605.msg3036239#msg3036239 date=1258782442]

Search for something like:

sendMessage("atObject2:

before that line add:
//

dude // is for saying messages so the code you are useing is not going to clash with it

        deletethatobject(3090, 3489); // like this

[/quote]
Yeah; but, he want’s it to stop saying the message, so he’d want to comment out the code by placing // infront of it. Read what he’s asking…[/quote]

This has nothing to do with objects for 3/4 of the repacks its at the bottom of the client.java. Adams 100% right. Good Job Adam!

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @aurisdj aurisdj
item.description:
@aurisdj wrote:

[quote="`Alec, post:1, topic:315186"]Maybe if you didn’t just hit CTRL+H and replace the creators name with yours it wouldn’t have happened.
P.S. Check whatever deals with object clicking, (Debugging).

Uhmm im pretty sure that you have to find the case that has that text and in front of the text add these “//” without the quotes…Thats the my idea i have. So sorry if that doesn’t help… It should unless your dumb… LOL… Let me know if you find that text…and if you add those symbols and it works…

No…[/quote]

maybe hes dumb.

item.title: I need help with objects :) i need to remove something
item.dc:creator: @freakinlost freakinlost
item.description:
@freakinlost wrote:

ok search the object id under in client.java:

    public void NewObjects() {

if it is not there place:

        deletethatobject(3090, 3489);

under:

    public void Deletewalls() {

NOTE:

YOU CAN NOT PLACE NPC OR OBJECTS IN THE LOCATION IF YOU USE DELETETHATOBJECT

REASON:

It is because it will delete the object/npc what ever you place there so thats one of the downfalls with
that option.

Read full topic
